AboutPage.description:
The routing is internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /about in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is prefixed with the locale (/de/about).
AboutPage.title: About

Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

s1.desc: Elevate your tabletop RPG experience on Discord with Mini Kraken! Our exclusive tool is designed to enhance your gaming sessions, whether on systems such as Paranormal Order (OP), Dungeons & Dragons (D&D), Tormenta20 (T20) and Gaia, providing unparalleled excitement.

3det.desc: Here, swords, guns and robots will be at your fingertips whenever you want them. If your opponents are big, just make yourself huge!! Fight for Earth, find treasure and make friends with robots.
3det.title: 3D&T

cb.desc: A cyberpunk setting set in a dystopian future with high technology, social inequalities and scarce resources.
cb.title: Carbon2185

dnd.desc: Epic adventures await. In a world full of magic and fantastic creatures, embark on exciting journeys, exploring dangerous dungeons, unraveling mysteries.
dnd.title: Dungeons & Dragons

gaia.desc: Bringing a medieval high fantasy setting to the magical world of Auroria. On Gaia you will be unique, walking a path forged by yourself, unlocking the locks of the Veil towards infinity.

op.desc: There is a thin membrane that prevents the paranormal from crossing into our reality, this membrane is thinning and the paranormal is manifesting itself.
op.title: Ordem Paranormal

t20.desc: A Brazilian RPG system where we have great adventures, several delicious gods, legendary items and guaranteed fun for the whole family.
t20.title: Tormenta20

s2.desc: The Application made by fans aims to help you play your favorite RPG, we do not own or have any rights over them, we are just a group of programmers and players who hate all the boring mathematics that tabletop RPGs end up creating.
s2.title: Adapted RPG systems

s3.desc: Track real-time performance data for Inanimalia Fortuna Tenebris Verteri - the best tabletop RPG bot for Discord. Stay up to date on your bot's performance and get the most out of your experience.
s3.title: Status

s4.1D: Don't waste time calculating your character's health manually. With the /edit life command, Mini Kraken does the math for you, allowing you to focus on playing.
s4.2D: Inanimalia Fortuna has an advanced dice rolling system, allowing different combinations with the /d command. Don't waste any more time making complex calculations, let Mini Kraken take care of it for you!
s4.3D: Easily organize character information with Smart Tokens. With simple commands, such as /sheet, you can create and edit character sheets directly in the bot, making your table more agile and efficient.
s4.desc: Mini Kraken is a bot for Discord that offers a wide variety of functions to help you on your tabletop RPG journey. Roll dice, manage initiatives, create characters, use name generators, and more. Check out just a small sample of everything the Mini Kraken can do for you!
s4.title: Explore the Functions

NamesPage.desc: This character name generator was created to be a starting point for you, helping you write a Book, RPG Campaign or game. If you are looking for names for your characters, you are in the right place.
NamesPage.title: Names Generator

poker.desc: Pull a random card from the deck.
poker.title: Poker Cards

tarot.desc: Pull a random tarot card from deck
tarot.title: Tarot Cards

NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
